website_summaries.verdict: While it’s lightweight for an upright bike, the tradeoff is peripheral parts that fail more quickly.
pros: Easy to handle and comfortable to ride on for many miles thanks to its upright style
cons: Instructions are not clear enough for less experienced owners
Some parts may fail within a few weeks or months and replacement parts may be difficult to find

customer_reviews.title: Solid bike.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. Fits me perfect, I'm 6'2" . Color is a dark grey. Easily assembled it in about 30 min. Quality components. Shifts great. Way more comfortable than my mountain bike. Would recommend. Nice 27.5" wheels too . Update- almost 8 months later and this bike is holding up great. I added a headlight and a water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: ace

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great and comfy ride. No issues so far. Far more comfortable for casual riding than a mountain or road bike. Should have gotten the 21 speed though as only having 7 makes any kind of hill tough. :P
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve compared a lot of bikes on Amazon, and this is the best one I’ve ever found. It’s price is affordable and it’s quality is pretty good, very easy to ride. I think buying a bicycle of the same quality in a bike store is estimated to cost more than 400 dollars. Assembly isn’t simple , but it’s not difficult when you follow the instructions from some video websites. I will recommend it to my friends.

product_meta.title: Raleigh Bikes Circa 1 Comfort Bike
product_meta.description: The circa 1 is the ultimate lightweight entry-level comfort bike. Made for city cruising, this cushy ride is ready to whisk you away from the worries of the day for tons of fun on the boardwalk, the bike path or just riding 'round in the hood. Designed to reduce stress on your body so you can enjoy the true freedom of exploring on two wheels, the circa 1's upright geometry provides a laid back feel that you'll ease right into, naturally. And the Raleigh comfort plush saddle well, this could very well be the most comfortable bike seat you've ever had the pleasure to ride. Made with memory foam, the saddle alone is sure to put a smile on your face. But there's more. The dual density grips provide a comfortable resting place for your hands. The twist Shifters offer 7 gears without ever having to move your hands, and big, wide tires roll comfortably, confidently and easily down the road. Comfort is King when it comes to the circa 1. Ride with ease and take in the view. Raleigh bicycles are designed around one simple idea: fun. It's an idea that inspired the very first bikes way back in 1887 and continues to inspire how things are done today. Hop on a Raleigh and enjoy the ride
feature_bullets: Made for shorter rides on the boardwalk, bike path or road
Designed for comfort with a lightweight aluminum frame, upright geometry, cushy saddle, and comfort grips
Offers 7 gears with easy to use Shimano twist shifters and a chain guard to keep clothing out of the chain
Includes Big, wide 27.5 x 1.95 inch Kenda contact tires with Anti-Puncture k-shield to reduce the chance of flat tires
